description: This file is a shell script used for configuring network interfaces, wireless access points, and bridge modes on a device. It manages hostapd configurations, network interfaces, IP addresses, and web server settings. It includes functions and commands to restart hostapd, modify configurations, and handle network bridging and forwarding.

methods.name: Restart_Hostapd
methods.description: Restarts the hostapd service by bringing interfaces down and back up, and killing existing hostapd processes.
